list.title: EditorDisplayMode#CONTENT
list.description:
Static property representing the CONTENT display mode. This mode simplifies the editor interface by removing non-essential elements and adjusting the layout. It focuses solely on the content of a single report editor by making the following adjustments:

  • Hides the reports list, scheduler module-related content, import-export functionality.
  • Cleans up the interface by hiding unnecessary toolbars and buttons.

In this mode, only the content of the requested report editor is displayed. Example:

list.title: PiEmbedActions.createDashboard
list.description: Initialises the setup for a dashboard instance without starting it. This method sets up the required configuration for interacting with the embedded dashboard, including its functional areas and features.

list.title: PiEmbedActions.reportEditor
list.description: A functional area for interacting with the Report Editor within the embedded pi dashboard. This namespace provides access to functionalities available in the Report Editor.

list.title: PiEmbedActions.reportEditor.open
list.description: Opens the Report Editor panel for a specific report by sending a post message to the embedded iframe to open the Report Editor UI for the given itemId.
